name: MyBoardGames
0:
”Alexa, ask board game what game should we play today?”
”Alexa, ask board game what game should I play today?”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: board game
des: Can't decide on which game to play? Are you spending too much time trying to pick a game everyone will like? No worries, this app will give you names of games that you and your friends can play.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
